data.title: The Pope gave Donald Trump a 192-page letter he wrote on climate change

A journalist who reported on police corruption has been killed in the Russian city of Minusinsk: Dmitriy Popkov, editor-in-chief for local newspaper Ton-M, was found dead in a traditional Russian bathhouse close to his home.
